    @pytest.mark.parametrize('search_term', ['StarCraft II'])

    @allure.story('Search and open streamer page')
    def test_twitch_navigation(driver, search_term):

    def wait_for_streamer_page_and_screenshot(driver, streamer_page, search_term, timeout=20):
        """Waits for the streamer page to fully load, ensures video is playing, and captures a screenshot."""
    
        # Handle any popups that might block the view
        streamer_page.handle_popups()
    
        # Wait for the page to fully load
        Waits.wait_for_page_to_load(driver, timeout)

        video_player_xpath = "//*[@id='channel-live-overlay']/div/div/div[1]/div/div[1]/div/div[2]/div/div/div[2]"
        buffering_xpath = "//*[@data-a-target='player-overlay-background']"  # Twitch buffering indicator
    
        try:
            print("Waiting for the video player to load...")

            Waits.wait_for_element(driver, (By.XPATH, video_player_xpath), timeout)  # Ensures visibility
            print("Video player is visible.")
